Plot: Following clues to the origin of mankind a team journey across the universe and find a structure on a distant planet containing a monolithic statue of a humanoid head and stone cylinders of alien blood but they soon find they are not alone.
Title: Prometheus
Writer: Jon Spaihts, Damon Lindelof, Dan O'Bannon (elements), Ronald Shusett (elements)
Actors: Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron, Idris Elba
tomatoConsensus: Ridley Scott's ambitious quasi-prequel to Alien may not answer all of its big questions, but it's redeemed by its haunting visual grandeur and compelling performances -- particularly Michael Fassbender as a fastidious android.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 42 nominations.
